title: Holes in Coherence

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: They're fascinating because they poke holes in the coherence you're both building and resisting.
dialogue.context: Pointing at an unfinished building with one broken window

scene_context: The Architect points at an unfinished building with one broken windowâ€”a perfect metaphor for how certain experiences disrupt the careful structures we construct, revealing the beauty in our simultaneous desire to build meaning and resist completion.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
